quotes.text: Success is a journey, not a destination.
quotes.author: ― Arthur Ashe

quotes.text: You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
quotes.author: ― Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: The only way to prove that you’re a good sport is to lose.
quotes.author: ― Ernie Banks

quotes.text: It’s not whether you get knocked down, it’s whether you get up.
quotes.author: ― Vince Lombardi

quotes.text: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
quotes.author: ― Wayne Gretzky

quotes.text: The more difficult the victory, the greater the happiness in winning.
quotes.author: ― Pele

quotes.text: Sports do not build character. They reveal it.
quotes.author: ― Heywood Broun

quotes.text: I’ve learned that something constructive comes from every defeat.
quotes.author: ― Tom Landry

quotes.text: Champions keep playing until they get it right.
quotes.author: ― Billie Jean King

quotes.text: Success is no accident. It is hard work, perseverance, learning, studying, sacrifice, and most of all, love of what you are doing or learning to do.
quotes.author: ― Pele

quotes.text: Winning means you're willing to go longer, work harder, and give more than anyone else.
quotes.author: ― Vince Lombardi

quotes.text: The harder you work, the harder it is to surrender.
quotes.author: ― Vince Lombardi

quotes.text: The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather a lack in will.
quotes.author: ― Vince Lombardi

quotes.text: Never say never because limits, like fears, are often just an illusion.
quotes.author: ― Michael Jordan

quotes.text: You have to expect things of yourself before you can do them.
quotes.author: ― Michael Jordan

quotes.text: A champion is someone who gets up when they can't.
quotes.author: ― Jack Dempsey

quotes.text: Sports are the only way to get away from reality for a while.
quotes.author: ― Unknown

quotes.text: To win, you have to believe you can.
quotes.author: ― Unknown

quotes.text: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
quotes.author: ― Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.text: It’s not whether you win or lose, but how you play the game.
quotes.author: ― Grantland Rice

quotes.text: The pain you feel today will be the strength you feel tomorrow.
quotes.author: ― Unknown

quotes.text: There are no shortcuts to success. You have to put in the work.
quotes.author: ― Unknown

quotes.text: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.
quotes.author: ― Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: You never know how strong you are until being strong is your only choice.
quotes.author: ― Bob Marley

quotes.text: That which does not kill us makes us stronger.
quotes.author: ― Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.text: Strength grows in the moments when you think you can't go on but you keep going anyway.
quotes.author: ― Unknown

quotes.text: With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.
quotes.author: ― Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: Courage is not having the strength to go on; it is going on when you don’t have the strength.
quotes.author: ― Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: The world breaks everyone, and afterward, some are strong at the broken places.
quotes.author: ― Ernest Hemingway

quotes.text: A calm mind brings inner strength and self-confidence.
quotes.author: ― Dalai Lama

quotes.text: Do not pray for an easy life; pray for the strength to endure a difficult one.
quotes.author: ― Bruce Lee

quotes.text: Sometimes you don’t realize your own strength until you come face to face with your greatest weakness.
quotes.author: ― Susan Gale

quotes.text: The strongest people are not those who show strength in front of us but those who win battles we know nothing about.
quotes.author: ― Unknown

quotes.text: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
quotes.author: ― C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: You were given this life because you are strong enough to live it.
quotes.author: ― Unknown

quotes.text: Strength doesn’t come from what you can do; it comes from overcoming the things you once thought you couldn’t.
quotes.author: ― Rikki Rogers

quotes.text: Tough times never last, but tough people do.
quotes.author: ― Robert H. Schuller

quotes.text: Life doesn’t get easier or more forgiving; we get stronger and more resilient.
quotes.author: ― Steve Maraboli

quotes.text: A strong woman looks a challenge in the eye and gives it a wink.
quotes.author: ― Gina Carey

quotes.text: The pain you feel today is the strength you feel tomorrow.
quotes.author: ― Unknown

quotes.text: A hero is an ordinary individual who finds the strength to persevere and endure in spite of overwhelming obstacles.
quotes.author: ― Christopher Reeve

quotes.text: Strength is not about how much you can handle before you break, it’s about how much you can handle after you break.
quotes.author: ― Unknown

quotes.text: The truth will set you free, but first it will make you miserable.
quotes.author: ― James A. Garfield

quotes.text: Three things cannot be long hidden: the sun, the moon, and the truth.
quotes.author: ― Buddha

quotes.text: In a time of deceit telling the truth is a revolutionary act.
quotes.author: ― George Orwell

quotes.text: Truth is stranger than fiction, but it is because Fiction is obliged to stick to possibilities; Truth isn't.
quotes.author: ― Mark Twain

quotes.text: The truth is rarely pure and never simple.
quotes.author: ― Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: You shall know the truth, and the truth shall make you mad.
quotes.author: ― Aldous Huxley

quotes.text: The truth does not change according to our ability to stomach it.
quotes.author: ― Flannery O'Connor

quotes.text: A lie can travel halfway around the world while the truth is putting on its shoes.
quotes.author: ― Jonathan Swift

quotes.text: Truth is not something outside to be discovered, it is something inside to be realized.
quotes.author: ― Osho

quotes.text: The truth is always a good choice, but it’s not always the easy one.
quotes.author: ― Unknown

quotes.text: It is not the truth that hurts, but the lying that does.
quotes.author: ― Unknown

quotes.text: Sometimes the truth is painful, but it is always liberating.
quotes.author: ― Unknown

quotes.text: Telling the truth and making it big is an art.
quotes.author: ― Unknown

quotes.text: Honesty is the first chapter in the book of wisdom.
quotes.author: ― Thomas Jefferson

quotes.text: You can handle the truth, but can you handle the consequences?
quotes.author: ― Unknown

quotes.text: The truth will make you uncomfortable at first, but it will bring you peace in the long run.
quotes.author: ― Unknown

quotes.text: Truth is a point of view, but authenticity can't be faked.
quotes.author: ― Peter Guber

quotes.text: The truth will come out, no matter how long it takes.
quotes.author: ― Unknown

quotes.text: The truth is like a lion. You don’t have to defend it. Let it loose. It will defend itself.
quotes.author: ― Augustine of Hippo

quotes.text: It is better to be hated for telling the truth than loved for telling a lie.
quotes.author: ― André Gide

quotes.text: Time flies over us, but leaves its shadow behind.
quotes.author: ― Nathaniel Hawthorne

quotes.text: The two most powerful warriors are patience and time.
quotes.author: ― Leo Tolstoy

quotes.text: Lost time is never found again.
quotes.author: ― Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: Time waits for no one.
quotes.author: ― Folklore

quotes.text: Time is what we want most, but what we use worst.
quotes.author: ― William Penn

quotes.text: Time is a great teacher, but unfortunately it kills all its pupils.
quotes.author: ― Louis Hector Berlioz

quotes.text: Time is money.
quotes.author: ― Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: Time is the most valuable thing a man can spend.
quotes.author: ― Theophrastus

quotes.text: The trouble is, you think you have time.
quotes.author: ― Buddha

quotes.text: They always say time changes things, but you actually have to change them yourself.
quotes.author: ― Andy Warhol

quotes.text: Time, the devourer of all things, is always running out.
quotes.author: ― Unknown

quotes.text: Time will pass, and seasons will come and go.
quotes.author: ― Roy Bean

quotes.text: Time is the most precious commodity in the universe.
quotes.author: ― Unknown

quotes.text: The bad news is time flies. The good news is you're the pilot.
quotes.author: ― Michael Altshuler

quotes.text: Time, once lost, can never be regained.
quotes.author: ― Unknown

quotes.text: Time changes everything except something within us which is always surprised by change.
quotes.author: ― Thomas Hardy

quotes.text: There’s never enough time to do all the nothing you want.
quotes.author: ― Bill Watterson

quotes.text: Time is a great healer, but a poor beautician.
quotes.author: ― Lucille S. Harper

quotes.text: Time does not wait for anyone.
quotes.author: ― Unknown

quotes.text: Time is the most precious gift because it’s the one thing you can’t get back.
quotes.author: ― Unknown

quotes.text: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
quotes.author: ― Socrates

quotes.text: Wisdom begins in wonder.
quotes.author: ― Socrates

quotes.text: Knowing others is intelligence; knowing yourself is true wisdom.
quotes.author: ― Lao Tzu

quotes.text: A fool thinks himself to be wise, but a wise man knows himself to be a fool.
quotes.author: ― William Shakespeare

quotes.text: Wisdom is not a product of schooling but of the lifelong attempt to acquire it.
quotes.author: ― Albert Einstein

quotes.text: The fool doth think he is wise, but the wise man knows himself to be a fool.
quotes.author: ― William Shakespeare

quotes.text: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
quotes.author: ― Buddha

quotes.text: Wisdom is the reward you get for a lifetime of listening when you'd rather have talked.
quotes.author: ― Mark Twain

quotes.text: In seeking wisdom, the first step is silence, the second is listening, the third is learning.
quotes.author: ― Unknown

quotes.text: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
quotes.author: ― Lao Tzu

quotes.text: To know, is to know that you know nothing. That is the meaning of true knowledge.
quotes.author: ― Confucius

quotes.text: Knowledge speaks, but wisdom listens.
quotes.author: ― Jimi Hendrix

quotes.text: With age comes wisdom, but sometimes age comes alone.
quotes.author: ― Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.
quotes.author: ― Amelia Earhart

quotes.text: A wise person knows that there is something to be learned from everyone.
quotes.author: ― Unknown

quotes.text: Wisdom is the ability to see and choose the right path in any given situation.
quotes.author: ― Unknown

quotes.text: The more I learn, the more I realize how much I don’t know.
quotes.author: ― Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Wisdom is knowing the right path to take. Integrity is taking it.
quotes.author: ― M.H. McKee

quotes.text: Do not judge, or you too will be judged.
quotes.author: ― Jesus Christ

quotes.text: Wisdom comes from experience. Experience is often a result of lack of wisdom.
quotes.author: ― Terry Pratchett

quotes.text: The wise man does at once what the fool does finally.
quotes.author: ― Niccolo Machiavelli
